attributes.action: HARRODS lockdown to prevent Coronavirus spread.
attributes.background: In order to prevent further spread of COVID19. This will prevent the spread during the commutes to work and interactions with colleagues and customers.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that all shops selling non-essential goods should close: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/pm-address-to-the-nation-on-coronavirus-23-march-2020

Harrods has announced that its store will be closing its store from Wednesday 25 March: https://www.harrods.com/en-gb/faqs/covid-19-statement

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
